'''Cecilias''' are a [[Local Specialty]] of [[Mondstadt]] found in the wild on [[Starsnatch Cliff]].

==How to Obtain==
Cecilias grow exclusively on Starsnatch Cliff.

See the gallery or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=35 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

Additionally, the following NPCs give Cecilias after following certain dialogue branches for the first time:
*[[Grace]] in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]] (3 Cecilias)
*[[Sharp]] on [[Starsnatch Cliff]], Mondstadt (5 Cecilias)

==Trivia==
*Cecilias are [[Venti]]'s favorite flower, and he wears one in his hat and adorns his lyre, Der Frühling, with it.
*The [[Nameless Bard]] wore a three-petaled Cecilia on his vest.
*The ancient civilization that resided in [[Cecilia Garden]] grew Cecilias in greenhouses.
**Based on the structure and ornaments of the ruins near Cecilia Garden, [[Decarabian]] may have had some connection to this civilization, but no further details are known at this point.
*Based on the [[manga]], the [[Ragnvindr Family]] may grow Cecilias.<ref>{{Ref/Manga|7|1}}</ref>
*The following birthday mails included Cecilia:
**[[Birthday/Razor#The day I was born...|Razor's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Cecilias)
**[[Birthday/Venti#The Wind Returns~|Venti's 2022 Birthday Mail]] (10 Cecilias)
*The Traveler could choose to offer a Cecilia as their Windblume of choice during [[Invitation of Windblume]].
